title: Shaya
steps: For the lamb: The meat is boiled with little water in a covered pan with onions, garlic and herbs.
Season the meat with pepper, cumin, salt and lemon juice
After it has cooked half-way, a small amount of oil is added, and the meat is fried in the pan with frequent stirring to get caramelization, that is, even browning of all sides.
Put the meat in a serving dish and garnish with onion rings
author: Nihal
